title: What is the Forum Banner depicting?
body: What is the current forum background showing?

replies.body: It's the Incognium Runeterra!  One of my personal favorite things.
How do i activate it ? (it's for a friend)

I dunno man - I imagine it'd take a couple of months just to find the opening latch.

It's a shame Zindelo can't help us or Heimerdinger figure it out
